entry.title: 读论文二
entry.content:
Title

2019 JMLR Decoupling sparsity and smoothness in the dirichlet variational autoencoder topic model

Problem

  • There is a trade-off between sparsity and smoothness in Dirichlet distributions.

    • The Dirichlet distribution encourages the sparsity in the latent variables. However, authors find that the desired sparsity is at odds with the generalization performance of the model.
    • In the case of variational autoencoders (VAEs), the trade off is that:
      • Either the model is sparse and achieves a good reconstruction error, but has a high KL-divergence term and thus a low log-likelihood of the model
      • Or it avoids low settings of the prior and thereby achieves a better log-likelihood at the cost of a higher reconstruction error.

  • There is no differentiable non-centered reparameterization function for the Dirichlet distribution.

Motivation

To identify the trade-off between sparsity and smoothness and provide an adapted neural network architecture to decouple them.

Method

  • 横向比较

a 为Dirichlet分布的参数，b为稀疏性系数。DVAE和DVAE Sparse的区别在于前者的b为1。

  • 内部探究

    • 模型结构

​ 这里引入batchnorm的原因是为了改善 Component Collapsing 问题。

  • ELBO和梯度的推导，详看论文。

  • VAE中的 Component Collapsing 问题。

    • What?

      This is the problem of a local minimum, which leads to parameters that are equal to the prior and thus, many or all topics are the same. Topic redundancy

    • Why?

      It occurs because it is often easier for the model to minimize the KL-divergence than to minimize the reconstruction error.

    • How to deal with it?

      • use much lower learning rates (NVDM)
      • annealing of the KL-divergence (Bowman et al., 2016)
      • batch normalization and dropout (Srivastava and Sutton, 2017, 2018)

Experiment

  • 除了 perplexity 和 NPMI（coherence）以外，还引入了 topic redundancy（越低越好）：

  • DVAE，coherence最高，但perplexity却非常高， topic redundancy一般。

  • DVAE Sparse，coherence一般，但是perplexity与DVAE和其他基于近似Dirichlet分布的方法相比较低，且topic redundancy低。

  • 分析：

    • 以Dirichlet分布为先验的模型在coherence上都好于以高斯分布为先验的模型（NVDM）。This further underlines the argument by Srivastava and Sutton (2017) that the sparsity induced by the Dirichlet indeed leads to higher topic coherence.
    • DVAE的perplexity却非常高是因为 KL-divergence 收敛到 0，则可以通过引入稀疏性系数，即DVAE Sparse来缓解。这表明了the coupling of sparsity and smoothness is responsible for the high perplexity scores. Also perplexity scores are not always meaningful when comparing different topic models.
    • 计算KL散度有解析式计算、采样计算两种方法。后者有利于增加coherence。

Conclusion

  • Authors have introduced a variational autoencoder with a Dirichlet prior called DVAE.
  • A trade-off between sparsity and smoothness was identified, leading to high perplexity as well as topic coherence scores.
  • To test our hypothesis about the reason for the high perplexity scores, a new model called DVAE Sparse was introduced. DVAE Sparse decouples sparsity and smoothness and thus enables lower perplexity scores on the one hand while on the other hand the topic coherence is still competitive.
  • The topic quality was also measured in terms of topic redundancy which is a good indicator for component collapsing as opposed to topic coherence.

entry.title: 读论文一
entry.content:
Title

2019 ICLR Variational autoencoders with jointly optimized latent dependency structure

Problem

  • latent variable models are often formulated with simple (e.g. Gaussian) distributions, making independence assumptions among the latent variables. That is, each latent variable is sampled independently. Ignoring the dependencies between latent variables limits the flexibility of these models, negatively impacting the model’s ability to fit the data.

    • e.g. VAEs are typically implemented with basic graphical structures and simple, unimodal distributions (e.g. Gaussians). Independence assumptions such as these may be overly restrictive, thereby limiting modeling capabilities.

  • Models with these more flexible latent dependency structures have been shown to result in improved performance. However, despite the benefits of including additional structure in these models, their dependency structures have so far been predefined, potentially limiting the performance of this approach.

  • Structure learning is a difficult task with a long history in the graphical models community. Unfortunately, the underlying objectives are often limited to graphs of a particular form (e.g., limited tree width), prohibitively expensive, or difficult to integrate with the gradient-based optimization techniques of modern neural networks.

Motivation

Rather than relying on pre-defined fully-connected structures (Kingma et al., 2016) or chain structures (Sønderby et al., 2016), authors seek to automatically learn the latent dependency structure as part of the variational optimization process.

Method

In this work, authors propose a method for learning dependency structures in latent variable models. In particular, authors introduce a set of binary global variables to gate the latent dependencies. The whole model (including its structure) is jointly optimized with a single stochastic variational inference objective.

  • 横向比较

  • VAE中，各个隐变量之间满足平均场假设。

  • Ladder VAE中，各个隐变量与其上一个隐变量相关，类似于一阶马尔科夫链。条件概率分布是高斯分布，其参数由神经网络得到。

  • Graph VAE中，隐变量的组织形式更为灵活。但是各隐变量也只是依赖于之前产生的隐变量，而不包括之后的。

  • 内部探究

  • 在图中节点数量有限的情况下，图结构的所有可能性是可数的，所有的可能性都是全连接图的子图。因此可以通过引入一个{0， 1}的指示变量 cijc_{ij}cij​ 表示节点i和j之间是否有依赖关系。

  • 本文假定隐变量与其父节点之间的条件分布pθ(zn∣zpa(n),cpa(n),n) p_{\theta}\left(\mathbf{z}_{n} | \mathbf{z}_{\mathrm{pa}(n)}, \mathbf{c}_{\mathrm{pa}(n), n}\right) pθ​(zn​∣zpa(n)​,cpa(n),n​)为高斯分布，那如何计算参数ψ^n=(μ^n,Σ^n)\widehat{\psi}_{n}=\left(\widehat{\boldsymbol{\mu}}_{n}, \widehat{\mathbf{\Sigma}}_{n}\right)ψ​n​=(μ​n​,Σn​)？通过递归的将各个父节点递归的相乘，并乘上各自对应的指示变量 ccc，再输入MLP后得到。即图中的 top-down inference 部分。

  • 另一方面，除了计算隐变量之间的条件分布以外，我们还要计算模型的后验分布pθ(z∣x,c) p_{\theta}(\mathbf{z} | \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{c}) pθ​(z∣x,c) ，VAE的做法都是提出一个提议分布qϕ(z∣x,c)=∏n=1Nqϕ(zn∣x,zpa(n),Cpa(n)) q_{\phi}(\mathbf{z} | \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{c})=\prod_{n=1}^{N} q_{\phi}\left(\mathbf{z}_{n} | \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{z}_{\mathrm{pa}}(n), \mathbf{C}_{\mathrm{pa}(n)}\right) qϕ​(z∣x,c)=∏n=1N​qϕ​(zn​∣x,zpa​(n),Cpa(n)​) 做近似。这里就是将数据x输入encoder得到一些feature，然后在输入一个MLP计算出提议分布的参数ψ~n \widetilde{\psi}_{n} ψ​n​，即图中的bottom-up inference部分。

  • 最后利用一个precision-weighted fusion将两个分布联合起来得到最后的隐变量分布：

  • 还有一个问题是如何确定 cijc_{ij}cij​ 的取值。因为 cijc_{ij}cij​ 是离散的，因此需要用一些技巧使得能够对它求导。这里作者用的是 Gumbel-Softmax estimator from Jang et al. (2017)：

ci,j=exp⁡((log⁡(μi,j)+ϵ1)/τ)exp⁡((log⁡(μi,j)+ϵ1)/τ)+exp⁡((log⁡(1−μi,j)+ϵ2)/τ) c_{i, j}=\frac{\exp \left(\left(\log \left(\mu_{i, j}\right)+\epsilon_{1}\right) / \tau\right)}{\exp \left(\left(\log \left(\mu_{i, j}\right)+\epsilon_{1}\right) / \tau\right)+\exp \left(\left(\log \left(1-\mu_{i, j}\right)+\epsilon_{2}\right) / \tau\right)} ci,j​=exp((log(μi,j​)+ϵ1​)/τ)+exp((log(1−μi,j​)+ϵ2​)/τ)exp((log(μi,j​)+ϵ1​)/τ)​

这里实际上将离散变量 cijc_{ij}cij​ 转换为了连续变量 μij\mu_{ij}μij​， 使得可以求解梯度。在优化的过程中，使用了退火算法的思想，当 τ\tauτ 大时，cijc_{ij}cij​ 较为平滑，当 τ\tauτ 小时，cijc_{ij}cij​ 趋于离散。通过调节 τ\tauτ ，我们学习 μij\mu_{ij}μij​ 的值。

Experiment

  • Analysis on latant variables' structure and node dimensions
  • Quantitative Comparations

Conclusion

Authors presented a novel method for structure learning in latent variable models, which uses dependency gating variables, together with a modified objective and discrete differentiation techniques, to effectively transform discrete structure learning into a continuous optimization problem.

In our experiments, the learned latent dependency structures improve the performance of latent variable models over comparable baselines with predefined dependency structures.
